description:

Nice kitchen with good cabinet space and appliances including gas range, dishwasher, microwave and refrigerator. Good amount of counter top and cabinet space. Granite countertops and tile backsplash! Nice-sized bedroom with closet. Beautiful 3-piece ceramic tile bathroom! Rear laundry room with W/D! Nice-sized rear yard that is perfect for entertaining! Nice windows with lots of natural light! title: You will love living here! Gorgeous bi-level 2 bed 2.5 bath apartment
description:
You will love living here! Gorgeous bi-level 2 bed 2.5 bath apartment.
Gorgeous bi-level 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom apartment in Francisville! This apartment offers- ample closet space including a bonus storage room in the basement, a private roof deck. As soon as you walk in, you’ll notice sunlight from a large bay window flooding the combined dining +  family room as well as a half bathroom. Directly across from the family room is the modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances/ crisp white countertops/ ample cabinet space and an extra closet under the stairs for food and cleaning supplies. Upstairs on the second floor are the 2 bedrooms + hall bath, and laundry room. The guest bedroom is spacious with a good amount of closet space! This room has easy access to the hall bathroom next door. Across the way is the primary suite which gets great morning light from the large bay window and has a custom-built walk-in closet. The primary bathroom is en suite and features a large, tiled shower. The hallway laundry room has a full-size stackable washer + dryer and plenty of additional storage space. Ascend to the third floor and walk out onto your private roof deck. The front side is perfect for entertaining friends and has a great view of the Philadelphia skyline. The back half of the roof is perfect for grilling and an herb garden! The split roof format allows for a shaded portion of the roof at all times of the day. In addition to the storage within the unit, there is extra space on the landing of the entryway that is convenient for leaving shoes and jackets. The apartment also has a private, dedicated closet in the basement that is perfect for large luggage and seasonal decorations. You will love living here with a quick walk to Fairmount+ local coffee shops+ convenience to the subway and the exciting growing local scene including The Met/ Libertee Grounds/ Osteria/ Bar Hygge/ Clementines Stable Cafe + so much more. Send your number for quick response.

225 W Tulpehocken Street #1 -- Welcome to this carefully restored and absolutely gorgeous historic twin from the mid 1800s in the Tulpehocken Historic District. This second-floor unit is a grand 3 bed, 2 bath with 12 ft ceilings, hardwood floors, crown molding, original decorative fireplace, multiple transoms, and stunning rotunda skylight in the kitchen. Enter through French doors into the light-filled living space with beautiful bay window, intricate molding, decorative fireplace, and soaring ceilings. The brand-new kitchen features white cabinets, stainless steel appliances, an island, and the spectacular rotunda skylight that provides even more light. 3 nice-sized bedrooms with excellent light, closet space, and ceiling fans. The unit also has a brand-new front-loading washer/dryer, radiated heat, and a brand-new mini-split system for cooling. Freshly painted throughout. There is additional storage in the basement and a massive, shared backyard for gardening and relaxing. Directly behind the Ebenezer Maxwell Mansion, one block to the Tulpehocken train station and a quick walk to Ultimo coffee and the Wissahickon.

title: "Stylish and Convenient 3-Bedroom Townhome in the Heart of Roxborough"
description:
Discover a prime living experience in the highly sought-after neighborhood of Roxborough with this stylish and convenient 3-bedroom townhome at 248 Parker Avenue. Perfectly situated near the Germany Hill trails, Kelly Park, and downtown Manayunk, this location offers the best of city living while maintaining a peaceful suburban atmosphere.
Step inside and be greeted by the inviting bonus room on the first floor, perfect for use as an office, playroom, or gym. This floor also houses the laundry room and provides access to the garage. On the second floor, you'll find elegant hardwood flooring, a modern kitchen with a dining area, a powder room, a cozy living room, and a door leading to the deck.
The third floor features three bedrooms with ample closet space and two full bathrooms, ensuring that everyone has their own private space to relax and unwind. Enjoy the convenience of two designated parking spots in the lot, driveway parking under the deck, and a one-car attached garage.
This townhome is move-in ready and waiting for you to call it home. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to live in one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods!

title: 3351 Bowman Street -- Charming 3 bedroom, 2 bath home in East Falls!
description:
3351 Bowman Street -- Charming and nicely updated three bedroom, two full bathroom home with parking available for rent in the desirable East Falls neighborhood. Enter through the cute and cozy front porch to the optimal open first floor layout with original hardwood floors, exposed brick, and fantastic natural light. Spacious living room that flows into the full dining room and kitchen. Sliding glass doors lead to the large deck great for outdoor dining and relaxing. Updated kitchen with great cabinet and counter space and a large window. The upstairs features a spacious primary bedroom with great closet space and natural light. Two additional bedrooms and a newly renovated bathroom with a full tub and skylight complete this floor. The recently finished basement with a full bathroom provides additional living space, home office or guest bedroom. The basement also features laundry, storage, and direct access to the parking space. Radiator heat, mini-split AC, and ceiling fans throughout. Centrally located, quick drive to Center City, less than 10-minute walk to the East Falls train station, easy access to Kelly Drive for an afternoon run or bike ride.
